name: PK-GFD
description:
Vertikal Horizon Project. A photography project to change my habits and also my curiosity about why almost all photographers that I knew (which is I often see) only point their camera at the object in front of them. Based on that, then I  change the direction of my camera, just tried to take pictures by pointing my camera up or down, and the result was beyond my expectation. Yes, the vertical horizon project is as simple as that.

File JPG. 3000X2250px
